flawed_nl_solution:
The theater can hold 50 people and they charge $8 to watch a movie so on a sold-out night they make 50*8 = $<<50*8=4000>>4000
On Tuesday night they only sold 24 tickets at $8 apiece so they made 24*8 = $<<24*8=192>>192
If they make $4000 on a sold-out night and they only made $192 on Tuesday then they lost 4000-192 = $<<4000-192=3808>>3808
#### 3808

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 4000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
